word_mean: 护监，管理人：监督别人活动的人，例如在专门房病或医院科室监督护理工作的护士

sentence.Network_en: Between you and me I think that new supervisor is a twit.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们私下说,我认为新来的主管人是一个傻瓜.

sentence.Network_en: He said I was too flighty to be a good supervisor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说我太轻浮不能成为一名好的管理员.

entry.tran: (尤指工人或学生的)管理者，监督者，指导者
entry.def: A supervisor is a person who supervises activities or people, especially workers or students.

example.ex: ...a full-time job as a supervisor at a factory...
example.tran: 在一家工厂担任主管的全职工作

example.ex: Each student has a supervisor to advise on the writing of the dissertation.
example.tran: 每个学生都有导师指导他们写论文。

means.word_mean: 1. one who supervises or has charge and direction of
2. a program that controls the execution of other programs

stems_affixes.word_buile: di分开+vis分开+ible能……的→adj.可分的
advise建议+able能……的→adj.可取的, 明智的
advise[v.忠告,劝告,建议;通知,告知]+ory……的→adj.劝告的
provision预备+al……的→预备的,临时的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 看得见的, 明显的, 显著的

vis看,查+ual……的→adj.看的,看得见的;视觉的

advise[v.忠告,劝告,建议;通知,告知]→ n.忠告,建议;告知

stems_affixes.word_buile: vis看,查+it走→边走边看→游览

stems_affixes.word_buile: de分开+vis分开+e→分离出→想出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 忠告,劝告,建议;通知,告知

pre预先+vis看,查+e→v.预知,预先警告
re再+vis看,查+e→再看→修正

Sentence.sentence: The supervisor of the laboratory is beginning to get headaches and dizzy spells because she says it's dangerous to breathe some of the chemical smoke there.
The supervisor of personnel refused the request
He is soon going to have an evaluation interview with his supervisor and the personnel director to discuss the work he has done in the past year.
But the damage to skill and craftsmanship- that's needed to build a complex airliner or a tractor, or for a worker to move up from assembler to machinist to supervisor - went largely unnoticed.
This situation is more serious, and the supervisor may need to take action
Some performance evaluations require supervisors to take action.

means.word_mean: 监督者, 管理者, 指导者, 主管人,导师

sentences.en: He said that he needed to get his supervisor to authorize my refund.
sentences.cn: 他说必须让主管人员批准我的退款。
